column1: The Undeeps were the two westward bends of the river Anduin located between The Wold and the Brown Lands
column2: called the North Undeep and the South Undeep. The upper part of the North Undeep also bordered the Field of Celebrant and was where the Limlight joined the Great River. Both of the Undeeps had many shallows and wide shoals that afforded an easy crossing for an army.

When Cirion became the Ruling Steward of Gondor he was aware of the danger in the north and established a few men in the old forts to watch the Undeeps.
